results.title: The Social Butterfly
results.description: You are a true extrovert! You love being around people and naturally become the center of attention. Energetic with excellent social skills, you enjoy meeting new people. You're the life of the party!

results.title: The Adaptable Ambivert
results.description: You're an ambivert, balancing between extrovert and introvert! You adapt flexibly to situations, enjoying both social time and alone time. You have a well-balanced social life!

results.title: The Happy Introvert
results.description: You love your alone time and you're a happy introvert! You prefer deep relationships with a few people and recharge in quiet environments. You have a rich inner world and know how to be happy by yourself!
